user_query: I want to find resources to enhance my classroom activities as a language teacher.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of educational websites specifically designed for language learning.
Identify and list popular mobile apps that facilitate language learning.
Gather and select a range of icebreaker activities suitable for the first day of class.
Find and suggest relevant books that could aid in language immersion for students.
Recommend movies that are beneficial for language immersion and cultural understanding.
